FOOTER.TAGLINE: We bring you the future of computing with innovative AI and IoT solutions that drive the global economy towards a safer, more sustainable horizon.

HOME.HERO_BADGE: EDGE AI FOR SMART & SAFE MOBILITY
HOME.HERO_PARAGRAPH: Our intelligent AI camera combines Driver Monitoring System (DMS) and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) to detect risks in real time and enhance road safety for drivers and pedestrians.
HOME.SECTOR_SUBTITLE: A single AI Dashcam system, engineered for the unique demands of every transport sector.
HOME.LOGISTICS_DESC: Fewer fatigue-related accidents, dispute evidence, driver protection. Lower claim frequency & severity, improved fleet risk assessment.
HOME.OIL_GAS_DESC: Enhanced monitoring, real-time alerts, full traceability. Major risk reduction, access to specialized insurance contracts.
HOME.TAXI_DESC: Driver & passenger protection, video evidence, improved driving behavior. Fewer liability claims, fraud reduction, potential premium discounts.
HOME.SCHOOL_BUS_DESC: Maximum child safety, incident management, parent reassurance. Reduced injury risk & legal disputes.
HOME.PUBLIC_BUS_DESC: Passenger safety, reduced vandalism, video evidence. Lower claims, improved overall risk control.
HOME.RENT_CAR_DESC: Reduced risky driving, asset protection, driver scoring. Fraud reduction, dynamic premiums (Pay How You Drive).
HOME.SERVICES_SUBTITLE: High-performance engineering for the next generation of business computing.
HOME.IOT_INTEGRATION_DESC: Seamlessly connecting your hardware ecosystem with intelligent cloud infrastructures.
HOME.HARDWARE_DESIGN_DESC: From schematic to PCB layout, we build the physical foundations of your technical strategy.
HOME.SOFTWARE_DESIGN_DESC: Custom enterprise applications and firmware optimized for performance and AI.
HOME.IOT_ACCELERATION_DESC: Speed up your time-to-market with our pre-built frameworks and rapid deployment tools.
HOME.ACCENTIFY_PLATFORM_DESC: Our flagship orchestration platform for real-time fleet management and asset monitoring.
HOME.PROTOTYPING_DESC: Transforming complex ideas into functional physical prototypes for testing and validation.
HOME.LOCAL_EDGE_DESC: Our dashcam runs a powerful Neural Processing Unit (NPU) locally. It analyzes 30 frames per second to detect risks in under 100 milliseconds—faster than a human blink.
HOME.OTA_EVOLUTION_DESC: Through Over-the-Air (OTA) updates, your fleet hardware stays modern. New AI detection models are pushed remotely, ensuring your investment improves over time.
HOME.SENSOR_FUSION_DESC: Merging high-fidelity Sony Starvis visual data with GPS, G-Sensor, and 4G telemetry to create a 360-degree digital twin of every critical event.
HOME.COMPLIANCE_TRUST_ACCOUNTABILITY_DESC: Our solutions are GDPR-ready by design, strengthening trust between drivers, operators and insurers while providing full traceability for every critical event.
HOME.INNOVATION_QUOTE: We don't just record video; we understand the environment. Our innovation lies in the synergy between proprietary AI algorithms and industrial-grade hardware.
HOME.ECOSYSTEM_PARAGRAPH: With over 40,000 active devices deployed across 15 countries, ACCENT manages one of the most robust industrial IoT infrastructures in the region.
HOME.HARDWARE_MASTERY_DESC: Proprietary PCB design and firmware optimization for high-uptime environments.
HOME.LTE_V2X_DESC: Seamless 4G/LTE, 5G-ready, and V2X communication for ultra-low latency alerts.
HOME.CLOUD_ORCHESTRATION_DESC: Centralized VSS/FMS platforms handling millions of data points every hour.
HOME.RELIABILITY_ZERO_DESC: Engineered for 96.5% uptime in industrial transport applications.
HOME.VALUES_QUOTE: At Accent, we foster a Culture of Discovery, propelling the tech sector forward with a creative strategy to meet your business goals. Socially responsible, we actively envision solutions for environment safety, energy optimization and carbon footprint reduction.
HOME.SAFETY_SLIDE_1_TEXT: Use of AI to monitor driving behavior, detect risks in real time, and prevent accidents through ADAS and DMS systems.
HOME.SAFETY_SLIDE_2_TEXT: Reduction in accidents and damages, leading to lower insurance, maintenance, and operational costs.
HOME.SAFETY_SLIDE_3_TEXT: Collection and analysis of accurate data enabling fleet managers and insurers to make strategic decisions based on reliable insights.
HOME.SAFETY_SLIDE_4_TEXT: Personal data protection and management compliant with GDPR by design, ensuring user privacy and data security.

ABOUT_US.INTRO: ACCENT is a Tunisian tech firm established in 2018, operating at the forefront of the IOT sector. We specialize in crafting and developing connected devices tailored for safety and monitoring, offering dependable data for innovators keen on optimizing resource performance through precise solutions.
ABOUT_US.VISION_TITLE: We envision a vibrant economy and a better society
ABOUT_US.VISION_P1: Our vision is rooted in being a thriving business trusted by our stakeholders for the accuracy of our data. We are driven to elevate the technology sector by constantly innovating, creating, and exploring new models of growth.
ABOUT_US.VISION_P2: We envision a vibrant economy and a better society shaped by our commitment to driving innovation in the technology sector.
ABOUT_US.MISSION_TITLE: Facilitating with Optimal Assets, Innovating for Security
ABOUT_US.MISSION_P: We facilitate effective asset optimisation and provide decision-makers and individuals with a wide range of services and applications to improve and secure the environment.
ABOUT_US.VALUES_QUOTE: At Accent, we foster a Culture of Discovery, propelling the tech sector forward with a creative strategy to meet your business goals. Socially responsible, we actively envision solutions for environment safety, energy optimization and carbon footprint reduction.

SERVICES.HERO_DESC: Drawing upon expertise across multiple domains, Accent has crafted solutions that piece together its rich history. These components seamlessly integrate into various applications through our flexibility.
SERVICES.SEC1_DESC: An advanced dashcam solution combining AI, real-time alerts, GPS tracking, and night vision to ensure smarter, safer driving. Ideal for accident prevention, driver monitoring, and fleet management.
SERVICES.SEC2_DESC: By integrating sensors, IoT devices, data analytics, and artificial intelligence, our service provides real-time monitoring of vehicles, traffic conditions, and infrastructure to optimize urban mobility.
SERVICES.SEC3_DESC: We offer comprehensive solutions for monitoring and managing energy consumption across various sectors, empowering businesses to reduce their carbon footprint and optimize operational costs.
SERVICES.SEC4_DESC: We specialize in delivering cutting-edge cold chain monitoring services tailored to meet the unique needs of businesses handling temperature-sensitive goods across the global supply chain.

SOLUTIONS.SUBTITLE: Tailored AI Monitoring for every transport application.
SOLUTIONS.AI_DASHCAM_DESC: An advanced dashcam solution combining AI, real-time alerts, GPS tracking, and night vision to ensure smarter, safer driving. Ideal for accident prevention, driver monitoring, and fleet management.
SOLUTIONS.LOGISTICS_DESC: In long-haul freight, our AI Dashcam monitors driver fatigue during extended shifts, detects lane drifting instantly, and provides evidence for high-value cargo protection.
SOLUTIONS.OIL_GAS_DESC: Transporting volatile materials requires extreme compliance. Our industrial-grade hardware operates in temperatures from -20°C to +70°C and uses tamper-proof storage.
SOLUTIONS.TAXI_DESC: Dual-lens monitoring protects drivers and passengers. High-definition cabin analysis records interactions, providing crucial evidence and professional standards.

PRODUCTS.HERO_SUBTITLE_LINE1: Experience AI-powered safety, clarity, and control.
PRODUCTS.HERO_SUBTITLE_LINE2: All in one professional dash cam system.
PRODUCTS.ORBIT_DUAL_FHD_TEXT: Road and cabin captured simultaneously in 1080p.
PRODUCTS.ORBIT_EDGE_AI_TEXT: ADAS and DMS running on-device for instant warnings.
PRODUCTS.ORBIT_LTE_TEXT: 4G uplink for live streaming and remote video pull.
PRODUCTS.ORBIT_CLOUD_TEXT: Critical clips stored securely for claims and audits.
PRODUCTS.ORBIT_COACHING_TEXT: Real-time voice feedback to correct risky behavior.
PRODUCTS.ORBIT_NIGHT_TEXT: Sony WDR sensor keeps details clear after dark.
PRODUCTS.ORBIT_FLEET_TEXT: Open APIs connect natively to existing FMS / VSS.
PRODUCTS.CORE_AI_EVENTS_TEXT: Detects in real time ADAS and DMS violations (harsh braking, collisions, unsafe distance, distraction, drowsiness, etc.) and feeds an objective driving quality score.
PRODUCTS.CORE_EMERGENCY_TEXT: Instantly generates and sends video events to the fleet manager for urgent handling and follow-up of SOS alerts.
PRODUCTS.CORE_FEEDBACK_TEXT: Third in-cabin camera integration for logistics operations and safety monitoring, combined with real-time audio alerts to the driver.
PRODUCTS.CORE_LIVE_TEXT: Instantly access live video from road-facing or driver-facing cameras for full fleet control.
PRODUCTS.CORE_GEO_TEXT: Real-time geolocation, speed, fuel consumption, driving time, trip history, stops, points of interest and consolidated FMS data for fleet management.
PRODUCTS.CORE_RECORDING_TEXT: Continuous Full HD recording as soon as powered, with smart energy standby modes.
PRODUCTS.ADV_SECURITY_TEXT: Intelligent real-time monitoring of road and driver with proactive alerts to prevent accidents.
PRODUCTS.ADV_FLEXIBILITY_TEXT: Easily connect multiple auxiliary cameras for complete coverage and enhanced deterrence.
PRODUCTS.ADV_COMPLIANCE_TEXT: Meets local regulations (DVS, PSS) while improving overall road user safety standards.
PRODUCTS.ADV_INSURANCE_TEXT: Reliable HD video evidence to prevent fraud and speed up valid claim processing.
PRODUCTS.MODULE1_TEXT: The Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS) triggers real-time alerts in case of harsh braking, collision risk and unsafe situations: unsafe following distance, lane departure, traffic violations, etc.
PRODUCTS.MODULE2_TEXT: The Driver Monitoring System (DMS) detects signs of fatigue, distraction, drowsiness and excessive smoking to reduce behavior-related risks.
PRODUCTS.MODULE3_TEXT: Advanced AI detects pedestrians and road users in real-time, even in challenging conditions, reducing collision risk in busy urban areas.
PRODUCTS.MODULE4_TEXT: Review every trip on a map with high-precision time stamps and speed data. Essential for fleet managers wanting full accountability.
PRODUCTS.EXTRA_NIGHT_TEXT: Sony WDR technology captures sharp video even in complete darkness or direct headlight glare.
PRODUCTS.EXTRA_MOBILE_TEXT: Control your dashcam and monitor critical events live from your smartphone.
PRODUCTS.TECH_STORAGE_TEXT: SD card up to 256 GB + Cloud storage
PRODUCTS.TECH_PACKAGE_TEXT: Dashcam (ADAS+DMS), mounting bracket, professional 256GB microSD card, installation kit (wiring kit, fuse add-on kit, fuse cap), alert button, user manual.
PRODUCTS.PERF_ANALYTICS_TEXT: Visualizing the transition from reactive driving to AI-powered proactive protection for drivers and passengers.
PRODUCTS.PERF_PHASE1_TEXT: Conventional fleet monitoring. High reliance on driver reflex. Statistical incident rate: Baseline.
PRODUCTS.PERF_PHASE2_TEXT: Collision warnings active. Lane departure prevention enabled. +40% Safety Score.
PRODUCTS.PERF_PHASE3_TEXT: Total driver & passenger synergy. AI cabin analysis and 24/7 cloud sync. 99.8% Risk Mitigation.
PRODUCTS.ROI_TEXT: Do you want full visibility into critical events, enhanced safety for your drivers and fleet, while reducing the cost and frequency of insurance claims? Discover how the MF2 AI Dash Cam effectively protects your vehicles and optimizes risk management.

RESELLER.HERO_DESC: Boost your business by selling the most innovative fleet management solution.
RESELLER.PILLAR_1_DESC: Partner with one of the leading providers and take advantage of the growing demand for fleet management technologies to develop your opportunities and strengthen your market position.
RESELLER.PILLAR_2_DESC: Increase your revenue by offering the sale, installation, and technical support of equipment. Provide your clients with complete solutions while generating sustainable additional income.
RESELLER.PILLAR_3_DESC: Offer a high-value complete solution to help your clients better manage their fleet. We support you in developing your business plan and provide all necessary assistance to ensure your success.
RESELLER.PLAYER_DESC: As a Reseller Partner, you have the opportunity to offer your clients innovative fleet management solutions while sustainably growing your business. You can expand your client portfolio, increase their loyalty, and benefit from recurring revenue linked to the evolution of your services. You can leverage several factors to increase your turnover:
RESELLER.PLAYER_LIST_1: Achieve an attractive margin on equipment
RESELLER.PLAYER_LIST_2: Receive monthly revenue through connected services
RESELLER.PLAYER_LIST_3: Enrich your offer with your own additional services
RESELLER.CARE_TITLE: We take care of the rest
RESELLER.GRID_1_DESC: As a recognized player, we understand fleet management trends and help you leverage them to accelerate your growth.
RESELLER.GRID_2_DESC: By collaborating with a global leader, you benefit from a strong brand reputation that facilitates access to new markets.
RESELLER.GRID_3_DESC: Access free regular training on our solutions to strengthen your skills and optimize your sales.
RESELLER.GRID_4_DESC: We create personalized sales training with you to help you better position our solutions and meet market needs.
RESELLER.GRID_5_DESC: We invest in your long-term success: the more your client base grows, the more your financial benefits increase.
RESELLER.WHY_LIST_1: Strong international presence: a local support network among the most reliable in the sector.
RESELLER.WHY_LIST_2: The widest range of integrations: applications, third-party solutions, and connected services adapted to all needs.
RESELLER.WHY_LIST_3: Total fleet coverage: cars, commercial vehicles, trucks, and much more.
RESELLER.WHY_LIST_4: Complete solutions: a range of products to simplify fleet management and maximize performance.
RESELLER.CTA_TITLE: Contact us and become one of our

PARTNER.HERO_SUBTITLE: Collaboration proposal to integrate our camera on your platform and quickly evolve to video telematics.
PARTNER.COLLABORATION_DESC: Integrate our AI Dashcam camera on your existing platform and transform your offering in just weeks. We provide free support on video integration to achieve optimal time-to-market.
PARTNER.EVOLUTION_DESC: Transform from simple geolocation or basic tracking to a complete video telematics solution in just one month. Our free technical support enables you to quickly integrate video features on your platform.
PARTNER.BENEFIT_1_DESC: Free support on video integration for fast and efficient deployment on your platform.
PARTNER.BENEFIT_2_DESC: Accelerate your market entry with our dedicated technical support and integration tools.
PARTNER.BENEFIT_3_DESC: Transform your geolocation offering into a complete video telematics solution in just one month.
PARTNER.INTEGRATION_DESC: Our AI Dashcam camera easily integrates with your existing infrastructure via our APIs and SDKs. We provide free technical support to help you integrate video features quickly.
PARTNER.SUPPORT_DESC: Benefit from our video integration expertise with dedicated technical support. We help you implement video features on your platform for optimal time-to-market.
PARTNER.TRANSFORMATION_DESC: Evolve your business in one month: transform from a simple geolocation or tracking solution to a complete video telematics platform with real-time video, AI alerts, and behavioral analysis.

INSURER.HERO_SUBTITLE: A GDPR-compliant embedded intelligence platform, designed for critical fleets, public operators, and European insurers.
INSURER.SLOGAN: “The data that reduces risk, the AI that protects your combined ratio.”
INSURER.VALUE_DESC: We transform reactive insurance into predictive insurance via objective behavioral data.
INSURER.CARD_1_DESC: Precise driving evaluation for dynamic and personalized pricing.
INSURER.CARD_2_DESC: Real-time alerts directly impacting claim frequency.
INSURER.CARD_3_DESC: Irrefutable video evidence to neutralize false declarations.
INSURER.CARD_4_DESC: High-value services strengthening the bond with professional policyholders.
INSURER.CASE_DESC: A 25% reduction in claims generates an immediate technical gain, allowing an 8-15% rebate for the insured.
INSURER.RISK_STRATEGIC_TITLE: Turning road risk into strategic advantage
INSURER.RISK_GOVERNANCE_L1: Actionable data for risk and compliance teams
INSURER.EU_COMPLIANCE_L1: GDPR – Privacy by Design – local DPA guidance
INSURER.ESG_IMPACT_L2: Lower CO₂ through optimized driving behavior
INSURER.ACTUARIAL_STATEMENT: We transform reactive insurance into predictive insurance.

LOGISTICS.CARD_1_DESC: DMS & ADAS reduce collision risks on extended routes.
LOGISTICS.CARD_2_DESC: Multi-channel video evidence secures high-value goods.
LOGISTICS.CARD_3_DESC: Fuel, maintenance, and claims costs fall with smarter driving.
LOGISTICS.MARKET_DESC: Trailer trucks undertake one of the most demanding and crucial roles in logistics transportation. The transportation of high-value assets and goods necessitates robust security monitoring with 4G dashcams. Additionally, managing driver behavior is essential for long-haul journeys.
LOGISTICS.CHALLENGE_1_DESC: Ensuring that the monitoring area is appropriate for the long dimensions of trailers.
LOGISTICS.CHALLENGE_2_DESC: Addressing drowsiness caused by long hours of driving in high-risk accident areas.
LOGISTICS.CHALLENGE_3_DESC: Requiring easily disassembled systems for efficient fleet management.
LOGISTICS.CHALLENGE_4_DESC: Implementing secure solutions to safeguard valuable cargo during transit.
LOGISTICS.ACCENT_QUOTE: Logistics Solution is a comprehensive and efficient system designed to streamline operations. It offers real-time tracking, monitoring, and reporting capabilities to optimize the supply chain process.
LOGISTICS.ADV_1_DESC: Ensure real-time visibility and full control over operations, offering multi-channel live preview, playback, and tracking capabilities from loading to unloading.
LOGISTICS.ADV_2_DESC: Utilizing ADAS, DMS, and BSD technologies, accidents are effectively reduced. Timely pre-alerts allow drivers to self-correct, contributing to safer roads and uptime.
LOGISTICS.ADV_3_DESC: Combat refueling fraud and fuel theft. Detect and record low economy behaviors such as harsh driving, route deviation, and excessive idling for driver coaching.
LOGISTICS.ADV_4_DESC: Collecting all fleet data on a centralized platform allows for smart reports covering mileage, working hours, and fuel consumption to enable informed decisions.
LOGISTICS.BENEFIT_1: Save operation costs by driving behavior monitoring
LOGISTICS.BENEFIT_2: Total solution for logistics fleet management
LOGISTICS.BENEFIT_3: Increase efficiency by processing electronic reports
LOGISTICS.BENEFIT_4: 3rd Party Support fleet manage software platform

OIL_GAS.CARD_1_DESC: Fireproof recording keeps video available after critical events.
OIL_GAS.CARD_2_DESC: Video and data logs support safety audits and investigations.
OIL_GAS.CARD_3_DESC: Theft and abnormal consumption are detected in real time.
OIL_GAS.MARKET_DESC: Oil & Gas is a critical logistics vertical due to the transportation of inflammable and explosive materials. Given the potential for severe harm in accidents, ensuring safe driving practices for tanker trucks becomes the top priority.
OIL_GAS.WARN_2: Fuel theft & insurance fraud increase costs
OIL_GAS.WARN_3: Lack of evidence after critical accidents
OIL_GAS.ACCENT_QUOTE: Logistics Solution is a comprehensive and efficient system designed to streamline operations. It offers real-time tracking, monitoring, and reporting capabilities to optimize the supply chain process.
OIL_GAS.CAP_1_DESC: Comprehensive support for live monitoring, real-time GPS tracking, and automated snapshot capture based on trigger events.
OIL_GAS.CAP_2_DESC: Event clips captured via LTE dashcam and uploaded based on alarms like overspeed, non-distraction driving, collision, or panic trigger.
OIL_GAS.CAP_3_DESC: Our solution seamlessly integrates with customers' platforms, providing comprehensive fleet management features.
OIL_GAS.CAP_4_DESC: The solution includes a fireproof box for backup recording in case of an explosion, as well as a UPS for power backup.
OIL_GAS.IMPACT_1: Improve the safety of goods, vehicles and drivers.
OIL_GAS.IMPACT_3: Save costs on vehicle maintenance and insurance.
OIL_GAS.IMPACT_5: Well integrated with customers’ FMS, merging it all.

TAXI.MARKET_DESC: The taxi solution industry has experienced significant changes with deregulation and new market entrants. This has placed immense pressure on taxi and transportation providers worldwide. We are dedicated to assisting the industry in addressing these changes and capitalizing on them to drive growth and success.
TAXI.ACCENT_QUOTE: Our VSS solution incorporates advanced technologies to enhance operational efficiency, passenger safety, and overall service quality.
TAXI.TECH_1_DESC: Integrated Taxi Dispatch System enabling efficient e-hailing, real-time navigation, and driver identification.
TAXI.TECH_2_DESC: 4G/LTE connectivity for continuous recording and live cabin view for immediate incident response.
TAXI.TECH_3_DESC: Seamless support for POS devices and on-board printers for professional receipt generation.
TAXI.TECH_4_DESC: Silent emergency trigger that immediately uploads video and GPS logs to the operations center.
TAXI.TECH_5_DESC: Occupancy sensors to prevent driver fraud and ensure accurate reporting of passenger trips.
TAXI.TECH_6_DESC: On-board WiFi hotspots and back-seat screen advertising to generate additional revenue streams.
TAXI.ADV_2_L3: Video evidence to protect drivers & passengers’ rights
TAXI.ADV_3_L1: AI functions make Taxi VSS smarter
TAXI.BEN_1: Avoid bad driving behaviors and easy to check the attendance
TAXI.BEN_2: Increase passengers by using e-booking system
TAXI.BEN_3: Effectively increase taxi utilization and increase profits
TAXI.BEN_4: Raise ROI by introducing advertising services

SCHOOL_BUS.CARD_1_DESC: Cabin and road views document every school trip.
SCHOOL_BUS.CARD_2_DESC: Cloud logs and alerts reassure parents and operators.
SCHOOL_BUS.CARD_3_DESC: SOS and instant uploads speed up decision making.
SCHOOL_BUS.MARKET_DESC: School bus transportation faces rising accidents and numerous challenges: student behavior, stop-arm violations, and parental anxiety. Resolving these requires absolute collaboration between schools and providers.
SCHOOL_BUS.TECH_DESC: Available for integration with 3rd party algorithms running on the system, deployed for ANPR, Face Recognition, and ADAS monitoring.
SCHOOL_BUS.HARDWARE_TITLE: FULL HD H.265 Stop Arm Camera
SCHOOL_BUS.HARDWARE_DESC: Delivers ultra-smooth and clear images for recording systems, providing undeniable evidence for stop-arm traffic violations.
SCHOOL_BUS.TARGET_1_L1: safer travel and less misconduct of driving
SCHOOL_BUS.TARGET_1_L2: ANPR Stop-arm solution to eliminate the risk
SCHOOL_BUS.ADV_1_DESC: Powered by dedicated All-in-one Neural Network AI chipsets for cutting-edge detection.
SCHOOL_BUS.ADV_2_DESC: Most reliable solution for student-left checking and seamless 3rd party integration.

PUBLIC_BUS.CARD_1_DESC: Dispatch sees cabin and road context in real time.
PUBLIC_BUS.CARD_2_DESC: Recorded clips support claims and investigations.
PUBLIC_BUS.CARD_3_DESC: Analytics help optimize routes and fleet usage.
PUBLIC_BUS.BEN_1_DESC: Real-time location tracking, ADAS collision detection, and intelligent speed control systems to ensure the highest safety standards for urban passengers.
PUBLIC_BUS.BEN_2_DESC: Continuous driver behavior monitoring and precision KPI management to train operators and maintain consistent performance across large fleets.
PUBLIC_BUS.BEN_3_DESC: High-accuracy people counting combined with big data analysis to reduce operational losses and maximize network revenue.
PUBLIC_BUS.ACCENT_QUOTE: Our VSS solution incorporates advanced technologies to enhance operational efficiency, passenger safety, and overall service quality.
PUBLIC_BUS.FEAT_1_DESC: Real-time arrival data and stop announcements for improved passenger experience.
PUBLIC_BUS.FEAT_2_DESC: Contactless payment and driver identification via integrated RFID/iButton modules.
PUBLIC_BUS.FEAT_3_DESC: High-bandwidth IP camera support for high-definition cabin and road surveillance.

CAR_RENTAL.HERO_DESC: Protect your assets and streamline liability with AI-powered vision and real-time tracking.
CAR_RENTAL.CARD_1_DESC: Geofencing and engine alerts to prevent unauthorized usage.
CAR_RENTAL.CARD_2_DESC: 4K evidence to verify vehicle condition before and after rentals.
CAR_RENTAL.CARD_3_DESC: Predictive diagnostics to keep your fleet on the road longer.
CAR_RENTAL.MARKET_DESC: Car rental companies face high operational risks: vehicle theft, aggressive driving that accelerates wear, and complex insurance disputes. Our solution integrates AI Dashcams with telematics to provide a transparent digital record for every rental period.
CAR_RENTAL.CH_1_DESC: Unauthorized zone alerts and real-time GPS tracking.
CAR_RENTAL.CH_2_DESC: Monitoring of dangerous driving to protect fleet integrity.
CAR_RENTAL.CH_3_DESC: Unquestionable video evidence for accident claims.
CAR_RENTAL.CH_4_DESC: Tracking mileage and fuel for optimized servicing cycles.
CAR_RENTAL.ACCENT_QUOTE: Our Car Rental Solution bridges the gap between customer freedom and asset security, offering a seamless interface for fleet managers to monitor health and behavior.
CAR_RENTAL.ADV_1_DESC: Eliminate 'he said, she said' disputes. Our cameras record high-resolution visual evidence of the vehicle's bodywork at the point of handover, securing your insurance position.
CAR_RENTAL.ADV_2_DESC: Equipped with motion sensors and remote cloud alerts, the system notifies fleet managers immediately if a vehicle is moved without authorization or leaves a defined geographic zone.
CAR_RENTAL.BEN_1: Reduce vehicle turnover time with digital condition reports
CAR_RENTAL.BEN_2: Lower fleet insurance premiums via proven safety tech
CAR_RENTAL.BEN_3: Identify and reward high-value safe drivers

COMPANY.HERO_SUBTITLE: Optimizing safety and performance for final clients and corporate fleets.
COMPANY.BENEFIT_1_DESC: Proactive prevention through real-time AI alerts.
COMPANY.BENEFIT_2_DESC: Indisputable proof in case of litigation or accidents.
COMPANY.TCO_DESC: Our dashcam technology reduces operational waste, prevents vehicle downtime, and extends your asset lifecycle.
COMPANY.INSURANCE_DESC: By providing provable safety data, our final clients often unlock substantial discounts on fleet insurance premiums. Our platform generates compliance-ready logs for seamless broker interaction.
